title: Drag, I Love You
overview: Be ready to get your heart refreshed and meet all the unstoppable funny moments in a comedy series Drag, I Love You. The story reveals a complicated love between a straight man and a straight woman that starts with ‘fake' feelings, both outside and inside, but as the situation is turned upside down, without realizing it, their love starts to blossom. Find out how much the story turns extraordinarily funny when a straight man and a straight woman have to turn themselves into Drag Queens to solve a complex investigation. Noo Na, a twin sister of Nadia, a top drag queen, is vying with Prab Seuk, a mischievous police officer who is assigned to investigate the case. They both need to search for the truth at the same place, Blueberry Rama. Chaotic, hot, and funny moments, together their love story begins. In the end, let's see whether these two fake drag queens can turn each other into real love.
